snippet: One of the Obama campaign's goals during the Democratic convention is to convince voters that they are better off than they were four years ago. On Thursday President Obama's surrogates drew on the administration's foreign policy record to make the...
abstract: One of the Obama campaign's goals during the Democratic convention is to convince voters that they are better off than they were four years ago. On Thursday President Obama's surrogates drew on the administration's foreign policy record to make the case.

headline.main: At Convention, Obama Surrogates Extol Foreign Policy Successes
